about_the_game:
Two months ago, you fled the suffocating confines of home with Lily, your adopted sister.

She's got a talent for leading you down the rabbit hole of booze and drugs, and you can't resist the pull.

Zoey, unlike Lily, wasn't discarded by their parents like yesterday's trash. Behind that angelic smile lurks a mischievous smirk...

No one knows what drives her, but whenever she shows up, the world goes straight to hell.

Sarah, your flesh and blood, is a pranking light in the darkness, pleading with you to live together in the safety of your home.

Once a strong and independent older sister, a violent incident involving your father left her emotionally shattered.

When Lily strong-armed you into leaving home, you never anticipated the lives that would be caught in the crossfire of your delinquency.

Is there a way to keep everyone satisfied, or will everything inevitably go to shit, as it always seems to do?

Features:

  • No common route, every choice leads to a unique adventure.

  • Multiple endings with dozens of meaningful choices and high replayability.

  • A story of family dysfunction and understanding of love.

  • Messed up characters, each with their unique brand of trauma and secrets.

  • Peel back the layers of psyches and uncover the disturbing truths that lie beneath.

"Are We in Love?" is a choice-driven dark comedy visual novel that questions notions of family. Love isn't a gentle breeze or a warm hug - it's a twisted manipulation game, challenging your sense of right and wrong. There are no butterflies in your stomach, only the harsh reality of cocaine's sting in your nostrils and the acrid aftertaste of vodka.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for a mature audience and explores complex themes that some players may find disturbing or uncomfortable. The characters, story, and situations depicted are fictitious.

The game contains references to alcohol and drug use, depictions of dysfunctional family dynamics, and portrayals of unhealthy relationships. Some content may be triggering for players.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS 3.4 (Holo) or later, or any modern Linux distribution (Ubuntu 20.04+, Fedora 36+, etc.)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Phenom II X3 or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with at least 256 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0-compatible graphics card with at least 256MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard sound card
